    • Constructor Detail

      • TPolynomial

        public TPolynomial(TRange range,
                   double[] coefficients)

      • TPolynomial

        public TPolynomial(double[] coefficients)
        Unlike MATLAB, this constructor reads the values from small exponents to higher exponents.
        For example [1,0,1,9] means 1 + x^2 + 9x^3, in MATLAB in would mean x^3+x+9...
        Parameters:
        coefficients - an array specifying the coefficient of the polynomial terms

      • getCoefOnePoly

        public static TPolynomial getCoefOnePoly(TRange range,
                                         int degree)
        Returns [1, 1, 1, ...] using the degree.
        Parameters:
        degree - any integer in range (0,inf)
        Returns:
        1 + x + x^2 + x^3 + x^4 + ...
